Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.States

Class EndingState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.States.PlayerState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.States.EndingState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class EndingState extends PlayerState
Represents the ending state of a player in the game This state is reached when the player has finished their last turn When every player has reached this state, the Objective Cards points calculation will start
See Also:
